welcome_message:
Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock!
You will be playing a best of five with a computer
playerChoice:
Pick one:
r)  rock
p)  paper
ss) scissors
l)  lizard
sp) spock
invalid_playerChoice: Pick r for rock, p for paper, ss for scissors, l for lizard, or sp for spock
readRules: Would you like to read the rules? Enter y/yes or n/no:
invalid_readRules: Invalid choice. Enter 'y' or 'yes' to read rules, or to skip, type 'n' or 'no'
playAgain: Would you like to play again? Enter y/yes or n/no:
invalid_playAgain: Invalid choice. Enter 'y' or 'yes' to play again, or to exit, type 'n' or 'no'
rules:
Rules:

Scissors cuts paper
Paper covers rock
Rock crushes lizard
Lizard poisons Spock
Spock smashes scissors
Scissors decapitates lizard
Lizard eats paper
Paper disproves Spock
Spock vaporizes rock
Rock crushes scissors
